name: B. Preparation for International Women's Day
statement:
International Women’s Day is coming soon! Polycarp is preparing for the
holiday.There are n candy boxes in the shop for sale. The i-th box
contains d_i candies.Polycarp wants to prepare the maximum number of
gifts for k girls. Each gift will consist of boxes. The girls should be
able to share each gift equally, so the total amount of candies in a
gift (in a pair of boxes) should be divisible by k. In other words, two
boxes i and j (i
ne j) can be combined as a gift if d_i + d_j is divisible by k.How many
boxes will Polycarp be able to give? Of course, each box can be a part
of no more than one gift. Polycarp cannot use boxes "partially" or
redistribute candies between them.
